rows.label: xs00070100_MSG0002
rows.name:
There's plenty of work back in the city for someone
who knows how to handle a weapon, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00070100_SEL0021
rows.name: Look depressed at the idea of work.

rows.label: xs00070100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then you're interested.
In that case, I might have just the job for you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00070100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Hey, I'm not trying to pressure you into anything, all right?
It'll be your decision in the end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00070100_MSG0005
rows.name:
But anyway, we can talk more details later.
For now, let's keep moving.[ST:wait ]
